## MapView.uriResolver property

\[\[UriResolver\]\] used to resolve application/deployment specific `URI`<!-- -->s into actual `URLs` that can be loaded with `fetch`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get uriResolver(): UriResolver | undefined;
```
